item.title: Get In Touch
item.description: Feedback is Welcome! Why get in touch? Part of my reason for creating and sharing these visual notes is to help others like me who are making the same learning journeys. My initial goal is to just keep shipping things - not waiting to make them perfect. But as I keep going, and get into the habit, I definitely want to add or update content that addresses any gaps or corrects any misconceptions that I may have inadvertently promoted.

item.title: Visual Guide
item.description: Azure Fundamentals The initial focus is on the Certification options for beginners focused on Azure Fundamentals. AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals DP-900: Azure Data Fundamentals AI-900: Azure AI Fundamentals Each of these options has a set of related learning paths, that we can use for the initial sketchnote calendar. Each learning path has several modules - with each module consisting of multiple units. The goal is to have at least one sketchnote per module, though we may have one per unit if the topic warrants it.

item.title: About This Project
item.description: Hello, and welcome to #VisualAzure – a project to build a Visual Study Guide for Azure Fundamentals and more, with the added purpose of also providing a quick and easy review guide for those seeking relevant Certification in one or more categories. Azure Fundamentals The main purpose of this site is to help everyone, especially beginners, get a more comprehensive understanding of the cloud computing space, using the Microsoft Azure platform as a reference point for describing relevant terminology, concepts and solutions for developers.
